sect1.title: Cluster Complexity
sect1.para: Identifies all maximal cliques in a graph and ranks them according to their Shannon entropy (in physics: "disorder" of a system) measured for a given attribute (for example different phenotypes in a clique). Displays the ranking and allows for selection of interesting cliques.

Columns in the results window can be sorted by clicking on their headers. Furthermore, clicking on a particular line of the results will automatically zoom in on the selected cluster in the visualisation window.
